title: 1990년 Izatt 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Izatt. 판결일: 1990-04-16. 법원: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: The People of the State of New York v. Alexander D. Izatt
**판결일**: 1990-04-16
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 160 A.D.2d 894

## 판결문 요약


Appeal by the defendant from a judgment of the County Court, Nassau County (Delin, J.), rendered June 21, 1985, convicting him of burglary in the second degree, upon his plea of guilty, and imposing sentence.
Ordered that the judgment is affirmed.
We have reviewed the record and agree with the defendant’s assigned counsel that there are no meritorious issues which could be raised on appeal. Counsel’s application for leave to withdraw as counsel is granted (see, Anders v California, 386 US 738; People v Paige, 54 AD2d 631; cf., People v Gonzalez, 47 NY2d 606). Mangano, P. J., Brown, Lawrence, Kooper and Harwood, JJ., concur.
...
